p: Min-max normalization was calculated with the following formula (Equation (2)). scaled(x) = (((b − a) × (x − min(x))) / (max(x) − min(x))) + a (2) where x, is a signal from the distribution of signals for an antigen across all (adult or child) participants, a = 0 = desired minimum value after scaling and b = desired maximum value after scaling.
